documents.document: @Rezri_Rez I dove onto the forum. Said my bit and left. I'm pretty sure the time vampire immershun twits will win. Frontier always caves in.
@CMDRHughMann Great phrase to remember. "You can please some of the people some of the time but not all of the people all of the time." ;)
@CMDRHughMann Don't worry.I got told to fuck off by a very popular streamer in front of 150other people just for trying to help. So nasty.
@Lauzirika It's an amazing film. Still a superb piece of sci-fi cinema. i love it. The set design is just superb. :)

@freemasonsmusic You guys make great songs. Great music speaks for itself. :D

@DRDMovieMusings @cliffmsimon Even a blank firing gun at close range is lethal. Fragments of shell casing can break off in the shot.

Without women none of us humans would be here. Simple as that! Total equality! #WomensMarch

@Aidan_Abacus @EliteDangerous i want to type a message to them. All the vids no one has trried a general communication i want to try!
@bobbyllew You are Rameses Niblick the Third! :D
@EliteDangerous @Aidan_Abacus You guys need to keep the pressure on. Thargoids are out. No putting the lid back on!
@adwoodsuk They are here now, Frontier needs to keep the pressure on now. Like ALIEN ramp the tension up and keep it up.
@Kerrrash @frontierdev Is it true reports of hypremydiction have been reported in the bubble!!? Squeeeee!!!
@OneViGOR @GraemeOnTheSofa No. A big war, lots of systems lost to the Thargoids yes but losing the bubble. No.

"Greatness never appreciated in youth,called pride in midlife,dismissed in old age,reconsidered in death."Wonderful words. #B5 @straczynski
